title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 346.8 - Means of payment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 346.8 - Means of payment

State Regulations

The local social services official shall determine the
means of payment acceptable to the SCU and shall advise respondents of the
acceptable forms of payment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
346.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
